long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the BetterVLR! This extension adds a variety of useful and fun features making your browsing experience more enjoyable and efficient. With the BetterVLR, you'll be able to:

• Check map win percentage of the teams that are facing off.
• Highlight teams in the bracket to easily see their past and next matches.
• See past players of a team.
• Easily search matches directly from the search bar.
• Embed images in posts.
• See who the creator of the post is with OP badge in the comments.
• Make and vote in polls.
• Use custom emojis.
• Block users.
• Embed various services (e.g. tweets) in posts.
• And much more!

BetterVLR is constantly being updated with new features and improvements.
